item.description: UPDATE: We are limited to 12 people attending at the Button Box. Fortunately we have a plan to accommodate the rest at ArtStudio 360 in Holliston. No worries; it's all worked out. BUT you should see the information on the Message Board (marked "NEW!" in red, just under the Sticky Notes on the first page) to make sure you're completely up to date about where you'll be attending. Thanks, and see you Saturday.
item.how_to_find_us: Khaki apron, name tag that says "Anne"

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: April 2009 NE ATCs+ Meetup--Now on April 18
